titleStmt.title: Christ knocking at the doore, or, The substance of a sermon intended to be preached in Pauls upon the Sabbath day which fell upon the fifteenth day of April last: but not preached, by reason of a suddain obstruction of that liberty which was promised him, being indeed unworthy to be the servant of Jesus Christ in any such ministration for ever. / Published by the authour Philip Tanny commonly Tandy.
titleStmt.author: Tanny, Philip.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. and are to be sold by Giles Calvert at the Black Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls, and Simon Miller at the signe of the Starre.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls
